description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Pasta Salad + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Creamy Pasta Salad + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 free range egg, hard boiled, peeled, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: To make pasta salad, combine pasta, egg, capsicum, cucumber, yoghurt and lemon juice. Serve with carrot sticks and broccoli.

Snack 1: To make the yoghurt cup, combine blueberries and apple juice in a small saucepan and simmer for 2 minutes or until blueberries are plump. Mash with a fork. Set aside to cool completely. Place extra yoghurt in a cup and top with blueberry mixture and strawberries. Cover and chill until ready to pack into lunch box.

HowToTip.tipText: Tip: You can swap rice crackers and hummus with 2 Vita-Weat crackers and 1/4 avocado.

recipeInstructions.text: Snack 2: Pack crackers and hummus separately.
